name: Sterco Digitex
tagline: Specializing in Web, New Media, and Elearning.
description:
Sterco Digitex is a market leading digital media company that specializes in high-end services in the spectrum of Web, New Media, and E-learning. The company boasts of having 18+ years of proven experience, 900+ domestic clients, and 15+ international business partners worldwide. In recent years, Sterco Digitex has registered a whopping 25%+ growth per annum.
In the exemplary journey of 18 years, Sterco Digitex has conceptualized, designed, developed and launched more than 1000 outstanding websites for a comprehensive range of industry verticals. The company offers global quality IT solutions boasting of highly scalable designs, well-thought graphical attributes and search engine optimized high-quality content. The company has no rival in developing customized and multi-functional websites that run on the latest technology platforms.
The technical prowess of the company in web media allows it to easily develop and implement websites of any complexity including Responsive Websites, HTML 5 Websites, PSD Conversion Services, Ecommerce Websites, WordPress Websites, Content Managed Websites (CMS), Dynamic Websites, Web Portals, Website Maintenance, Content Writing Services
